subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Japanese shinjitai {{Han simp|樣|f=羕|t=𣴎}}; compare bottom of [[暴]].

Right component is approximately 𦍌 + 氺.
<!--
Right component is approximately 羊 + 水, but this is misleading. The composition is more similar to [[隶]]: there is a single vertical stroke (not two separate characters), and the bottom left component is drawn as two strokes, as in [[冫]], not one stroke, as in the left side of 水.
-->
